metadata.synopsis: This AD plays during the Ketheric Showdown in the lower Colony, when Ketheric uses his "Command Troops" ability to make his minions focus their efforts on attacking a specific target. This will only happen during the first phase, in Ketheric's human form.
metadata.how_to_trigger: This AD plays during the Ketheric Showdown in the lower Colony, when Ketheric uses his "Command Troops" ability to make his minions focus their efforts on attacking a specific target. This will only happen during the first phase, in Ketheric's human form.- Load SCL_Main_A- Using ReCon command "oe KethericShowdown_Start"  to teleport yourself there.- Go through the dialog, approach Ketheric, go through that dialog too. Combat will start.- It is advisable to enter godmode with ReCon command "god". - Wait in combat for Ketheric to use this ability.
